name: Epic of Serinor: Dawnshadow
description: Dawnshadow is a modern RPG styled after the great 8-bit classics of old. Follow the adventures of a psychic orc with various reptilian pets in the struggle for freedom from imprisonment by the god of darkness and destruction. Which sounds silly written out like that. What was I saying?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 64 MB RAM Storage: 16 MB available space
